item.title: Forever 21 破产债权人调查 Sparc 与 JCPenney 的并购案
item.description: Forever 21 Inc. 美国运营商的一个无担保债权人委员会表示，他们正在 "积极调查 "该零售商在申请破产保护前进行的所有交易，包括 JCPenney 收购运营商母公司 Sparc Group 的交易。【原文：A committee of unsecured creditors to Forever 21 Inc.’s US operator said they are “aggressively investigating” all deals made by the retailer before it filed for Chapter 11, including JCPenney’s acquisition of the operator’s parent Sparc Group.】

item.title: 艾斯勒在损失 3000 万美元后停止了皮亚夫斯基花苞的交易
item.description: Eisler Capital 的投资组合经理 Barry Piafsky 和他的团队在市场持续大跌期间损失了数百万美元，现已被停止交易。【原文：Eisler Capital’s portfolio manager Barry Piafsky and his team have been stopped out from trading after they lost millions of dollars during the ongoing market selloff.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后，对冲基金以创纪录的速度逆转石油押注
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对主要贸易伙伴征收关税，威胁到全球能源需求，对冲基金以有史以来最快的速度扭转了对石油的立场。【原文：Hedge funds reversed their position on oil at the fastest pace on record as US President Donald Trump imposed tariffs against major trade partners, threatening to cripple global energy demand.】

item.title: 前 OpenAI 员工在阻止重组的法律斗争中支持马斯克
item.description: 十几名 OpenAI 的前员工反对这家初创公司改组为营利性公司的计划，支持埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）对这一高风险改组提出的法律挑战。【原文：A dozen former OpenAI employees are objecting to the startup’s plan to restructure as a for-profit, siding with Elon Musk’s high-stakes legal challenge to the overhaul.】

item.title: 阿根廷中央银行抛售多达 4 亿美元以保护比索
item.description: 阿根廷当局在周五的一份声明中说，阿根廷中央银行周五抛售了 3.98 亿美元以捍卫比索，这是自 3 月中旬以来抛售比索最多的一天。【原文：Argentina’s Central Bank sold $398 million to defend the peso on Friday, the most in a day since mid-March, authorities said in a statement on Friday.】

item.title: 巴纳德大学、锡拉丘兹大学评级展望因债务负担沉重而被降级
item.description: 本周，巴纳德学院（Barnard College）和锡拉丘兹大学（Syracuse University）的债券评级展望转为负面，这表明两所学校都可能因债务负担而被降级。【原文：Barnard College and Syracuse University saw their bond-rating outlooks flipped to negative this week, signaling both schools could be downgraded because of their debt loads.】

item.title: 在国际货币基金组织（IMF）达成协议之前，阿根廷通胀率升幅超出预期
item.description: 阿根廷上个月的通货膨胀率创下了自 8 月份以来的最大涨幅，原因是在就国际货币基金组织的新融资方案进行预期投票之前，货币波动加剧。【原文：Argentina’s inflation last month jumped the most since August amid increased currency volatility in the run-up to an expected vote on a fresh financing package from the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会禁止高管加入埃克森和雪佛龙董事会的禁令受到质疑
item.description: 拜登时代禁止两位著名石油高管在美国最大石油公司董事会任职的反垄断裁决正在受到挑战。【原文：Biden-era antitrust rulings that barred two prominent oil executives from serving on the boards of the biggest US oil companies are being challenged.】

item.title: MLIV Pulse 发现，关税暂停为时已晚，美国人正在出走
item.description: 根据最新的 MLIV Pulse 调查，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普暂停广泛征收关税，但投资者仍希望避开美国资产，转而投资欧洲和其他发达市场。【原文：Despite President Donald Trump’s pause on broad tariffs, investors are still looking to shun US assets in favor of Europe and other developed markets, according to the latest MLIV Pulse survey.】

item.description:

item.title: 杰富瑞准备 6 亿美元出售德克萨斯州合成氨厂债务
item.description: Jefferies Financial Group Inc. 正准备在杠杆债务资本市场为特种化学品制造商 Gulf Coast Ammonia 筹集约 6 亿美元资金。【原文：Jefferies Financial Group Inc. is preparing to raise approximately $600 million in the leveraged debt capital markets for specialty chemicals manufacturer Gulf Coast Ammonia.】

item.title: 国债市场走势对通胀挂钩债券更为不利
item.description: 通胀挂钩债券是本月国债市场剧烈下跌的最大输家，而这只是通胀预期的部分原因。【原文：Inflation-linked bonds are the biggest losers in this month’s violent Treasury market selloff, and that’s only partly due to inflation expectations.】

item.title: 美国律师拒绝向法官透露被错误驱逐者的命运
item.description: 在最高法院下令美国协助一名被错误驱逐出境的马里兰州男子从萨尔瓦多臭名昭著的监狱返回美国的一天后，特朗普政府的一名律师在一次有争议的听证会上拒绝告诉法官政府正在采取什么措施来遣返这名男子。【原文：A Trump administration lawyer refused to tell a judge what the government is doing to bring back a wrongly deported Maryland man during a contentious hearing a day after the Supreme Court ordered the US to facilitate the man’s return from a notorious prison in El Salvador.】

item.title: 市场波动加剧，周五信贷交易更加繁忙
item.description: 对于美国企业债券交易员来说，金融市场的波动正在打破周五的平静。【原文：For US corporate bond traders, the volatility in financial markets is chipping away at their usual Friday lull.】

item.title: 美国页岩钻机闲置速度近两年最快
item.description: 由于日益加剧的国际贸易紧张局势有可能抑制能源需求，美国页岩地区的钻井数量出现了近两年来最快的下降。【原文：Drilling in the US shale patch declined at the fastest pace in almost two years as mounting international trade tensions threaten to stifle energy demand.】

item.title: 美股波动让新兴市场甚至比特币都显得平静
item.description: 前一天上涨 9.5%，第二天下跌 3.5%：投资者期待的是新兴经济体的股票市场或声名狼藉的比特币，而不是美国公司。【原文：Up 9.5% one day, down 3.5% the next: Investors expect those kind of oscillations from equity markets in emerging economies or the notoriously turbulent Bitcoin, not Corporate America.】

item.title: 都铎债券交易员菲利普斯四月损失 1.4 亿美元
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税大棒重创了包括美国国债在内的金融市场，都铎投资公司交易员亚历山大-菲利普斯（Alexander Phillips）在 4 月份到本周早些时候损失了约 1.4 亿美元。【原文：Tudor Investment Corp. trader Alexander Phillips lost about $140 million in April through earlier this week as President Donald Trump’s tariff barrage hammered financial markets, including US Treasuries.】

item.title: 美国经济学家称特朗普转向后经济衰退风险仍高
item.description: 尽管特朗普政府本周决定推迟对众多贸易伙伴征收重大关税，但华尔街经济学家仍维持对美国经济增长急剧放缓的预测，并警告经济衰退的风险仍然很高。【原文：Wall Street economists maintained their forecasts for a sharp slowdown in US economic growth and warned recession risk is still elevated despite the Trump administration’s decision this week to delay major tariffs on a wide range of trading partners.】

item.title: 特朗普向在 2020 年欺诈问题上与他交恶的专家施压
item.description: 2020 年 12 月 16 日星期三，美国华盛顿，网络安全和基础设施安全局前局长克里斯托弗-克雷布斯（Christopher Krebs）在参议院国土安全和政府事务委员会听证会上聆听。听证会将审查特朗普总统关于2020年总统大选投票违规的说法。摄影师：格雷格-纳什/《国会山报【原文：Christopher Krebs, former director of the Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency, listens during a Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs Committee hearing in Washington, D.C., U.S., on Wednesday, Dec. 16, 2020. The hearing will examine President Trump's claims of voting irregularities in the 2020 presidential election. Photographer: Greg Nash/The Hill】

item.title: 周末波动告诉债券交易员波动尚未结束
item.description: 市政债券市场正在受到严厉的警示：波动可能还没有结束。【原文：The muni market is getting a tough wake-up call: The volatility may not be over just yet.】

item.title: 关税冲击下美国最繁忙港口下月进口量将下降
item.description: 由于惩罚性关税开始抑制对外国商品的需求，这个美国最繁忙港口的进口量最快将在 5 月份开始下降，并将在下半年急剧下降。【原文：Imports at the busiest US port should start declining as soon as May and are set to fall sharply in the second half of the year as punitive tariffs start to weigh on demand for foreign goods.】

item.title: 价格下滑，俄罗斯石油运输转向西方油轮
item.description: 油价暴跌使得俄罗斯的原油可以由西方公司拥有并投保的油轮运输，这有助于收紧大西洋盆地附近的油轮市场。【原文：A slump in oil prices is allowing Russia’s crude to be carried on tankers owned and insured by western companies, helping tighten the market for those ships around the Atlantic basin.】

item.title: 加拿大科技公司首席执行官敦促在投票前就经济问题展开 "真正的辩论
item.description: 加拿大科技界领袖呼吁，下周各政党领袖在台上讨论各自观点时，应就国家的经济未来展开 "真正的辩论"。【原文：Canadian technology leaders are calling for a “real debate” about the country’s economic future when party leaders discuss their views on stage next week.】

item.title: 特朗普动摇世界秩序，加拿大养老金瞄准欧洲
item.description: 加拿大最大的养老基金近年来增持了美国资产，以利用强劲的经济增长。现在，唐纳德-特朗普总统的议程让一些人将欧洲视为吸引资金的地方。【原文：Canada’s biggest pension funds increased their ownership of US assets in recent years to tap into strong economic growth. President Donald Trump’s agenda now has some eyeing Europe as an attractive spot for capital.】

item.description:

item.title: 雪佛龙公司被勒令在制裁前调转委内瑞拉油船航向
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）被勒令向委内瑞拉石油公司（Petroleos de Venezuela SA）归还近 100 万桶委内瑞拉石油，这对该石油巨头来说是一个打击，因为在美国制裁的最后期限于 5 月份到来之前，该公司正在努力确保在委内瑞拉的业务结束之前获得原油。【原文：Chevron Corp. was ordered to return nearly 1 million barrels of Venezuelan oil to Petroleos de Venezuela SA in a blow to the oil major, which was working to secure crude before wrapping up operations in the country when a US sanctions deadline hits in May.】

item.title: 每日拍卖会上的黄金竞拍热潮推动黄金价格飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 每日拍卖会上的抢购活动推动了黄金价格最近一次刷新纪录；这一迹象表明，即使在黄金价格创下历史新高的情况下，市场上的主要参与者仍在增持黄金。【原文：Gold’s latest surge to fresh records has been fueled by a rush of buying activity in daily auctions — a sign that major players in the market are still adding to their holdings even at all-time high prices.】

item.title: 萨尔茨吉特结束与 GP、TSR 财团的收购谈判
item.description: 德国萨尔茨吉特钢铁公司（Salzgitter AG）结束了与 GP Günter Papenburg AG 和 TSR Recycling GmbH & Co.【原文：German steelmaker Salzgitter AG ended talks with a consortium of GP Günter Papenburg AG and TSR Recycling GmbH & Co. regarding a potential takeover offer.】

item.title: 花旗称关税将颠覆中美乙烷和丙烷贸易
item.description: 据花旗集团称，中美关税之争将扰乱乙烷和丙烷市场，有可能颠覆近年来随着塑料制造业发展而急剧增长的贸易。【原文：The US-China tariff battle is set to disrupt ethane and propane markets, according to Citigroup Inc., threatening to upend a trade that has surged in recent years as plastics manufacturing ramps up.】

item.title: 安哥拉动用 2 亿美元满足摩根大通贷款保证金要求
item.description: 安哥拉称，本周早些时候，在这个产油国的美元债券随原油价格下滑之后，它使用了约2亿美元作为摩根大通公司10亿美元贷款的额外抵押。【原文：Angola said it used about $200 million as additional collateral for a $1 billion loan from JPMorgan Chase & Co. after the oil-producing nation’s dollar bonds slumped along with crude prices earlier this week.】
